txt.en: You should gather the sheep on the hills due north of Erelas in the Beacon Hills.
You should lead the first flock of sheep back to Ost Rimmon.
Led the flock to safety in Ost Rimmon
Gather sheep from the north of Erelas ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Lavandir rushed to Ost Rimmon and inadvertently left his flocks unattended and possibly in danger.
Lead the sheep to safety
A sheep is now following you ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Led the flock to safety in Ost Rimmon
Now that you have led the flocks of sheep to safety, you should return to Lavandir in Ost Rimmon.
Gathering Wool
You should lead the second flock of sheep back to Ost Rimmon.
You should gather the sheep from the north-eastern slope of Calenhad in the Beacon Hills.

'You would make a fine shepherd, [placeholder]! My flocks are accounted for and unaware of the troubles surrounding them. If we are held here long, they will make food and garments for these folk too, as well they ought.'
'If you would lead my flocks to safety here, my heart would rest easy, [placeholder]. The flocks are like as not where I left them, on the hills due north and north-west of here.'
'If you would lead my flocks to safety here, my heart would rest easy, [placeholder]. The flocks are like as not where I left them, north of Erelas, north-east of Calenhad, and west of B창r Nadhron.'
'If you would lead my flocks to safety here, my heart would rest easy, [placeholder]. The flocks are like as not where I left them, on the hills due north and north-west of here.'
A sheep is now following you ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'If you would lead my flocks to safety here, my heart would rest easy, [placeholder]. The flocks are like as not where I left them, on the hills due north and north-west of here.'
You should gather the sheep west of B창r Nadhron in the Beacon Hills.
Return to Lavandir
Lead the sheep to safety
You should lead the third flock of sheep back to Ost Rimmon.
Gather sheep west of B창r Nadhron ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Gather sheep from the slope of Calenhad ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Lead the sheep to safety
A sheep is now following you ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'What a bind! I ran here in a fright and left my flocks grazing out upon the hills. Now I don't dare go back out, what with those bad men and their swords roaming to and fro. Now you, you're not afraid of those men, are you, [placeholder]? Would you go and lead my sheep back here to me? If they're left out there, they'll be eaten up by wolves and swordsmen, every last one!\n\n'My flocks will not have strayed far. They were on the pastures north of Erelas, north-east of Calenhad, and west of B창r Nadhron.'
Led the flock to safety in Ost Rimmon
